import{FontAwesomeIcon}from'@fortawesome/react-fontawesome';import{faStar as fasStar}from'@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons';/**
 * Renders the ratings overview component.
 *
 * @component

 * @param {number} props.ratingsCount - The total count of ratings.
 * @param {number[]} props.starCounts - The count of each star rating.
 * @param {Function} props.handleRating - The function to handle rating changes made by user.
 * @returns {JSX.Element} The rendered component.
 */import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const RatingsOverview=_ref=>{let{averageRating,ratingsCount,starCounts}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:" w-full md:w-3/5",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-lg font-semibold text-gray-700",children:"Overall Rating"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-3xl font-bold text-gray-700",children:[averageRating,"/5"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-sm",children:["Based on ",ratingsCount," reviews"]}),Object.keys(starCounts).sort((a,b)=>b-a).map(starRating=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center my-1 gap-x-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"w-8 pr-2 flex items-center",children:[starRating,' ',/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:fasStar,className:"text-yellow-400 ml-1"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"w-full bg-gray-200 rounded-full h-2.5 dark:bg-gray-300",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"bg-yellow-400 h-2.5 rounded-full",style:{width:"".concat(starCounts[starRating]/ratingsCount*100,"%")}})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:starCounts[starRating]})]},starRating))]});};export default RatingsOverview;
